content.detailedDescription: I all ways watch the night sky's and i noticed two orbs one was leading and the second one was maybe 100 yards behind it may be less both on the same path and speed then i lost track of them never seen that before one the second one look like it stop at a star then got behind the leader that's it
content.summary: Saw tow dime orbs around the stars very high above the stars headed south at 9:30 pm on the 4th august

content.detailedDescription: It was a hot night in june of 1994 my friend andi were bass fishing on lake mccoy in apopka florida i stretched my neck and inadvertantly looked to the right. thats when iobserved the brightest light i had ever seen in the night sky.I commented to my friend hey do you that xxxx and at that exact moment it was hovering directly over our heads.Imean 20 to 30 feet above.It had around circle of super bright  light directly in the center of the bottom of itwith slightly duller rectangular lights surrounding the circle it emitted a strange low pitched whirring pulsating sound and the rectangles seemed to get brighter in sequence.At some point it shot off and up to the southeast paused and disappeared. and when we got back to the truck one and one half hours had elapsed.My friend and i discussed the event briefly and agreed to tell no one.Not long after this we quit speaking to eachother and have not seen or spoke to eachother since and we were best friends. inever believed in ufos or much of anything else up to that point but this event was truly alife changing experience.Thanks for the chance to finally tell this story
content.summary: My friend and i observed a bright light while fishing it then approached hovered over our heads then flew off

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine and i went night fishing at a lake called emma.  its just north of topeka indiana.  we were sitting in the float tubes on a calm summer night. you could hear a pin drop.  there was no wind either.  at about 3 am i was facing the shoreline and my friend was facing the other direction fishing deep water.  when i went to cast i saw a blue fireball appear about 30ft above the trees right in front of me, then another and another until it formed a giant circle. the second the first "afterburner" connected to the last one the whole circle ignited. i looked towards my friend because the light was so bright.  then i realized i could see for miles beyond the lake.  it was like night turned into day. i looked back at the circle and right when i did...Boom the exact sound you hear when a jet breaks the sound barrier.  i know because i have seen it a few times at air shows. in that second it just vanished.  in other words it went from a dead stop to breaking the sound barrier in a split second.  no human made craft can do that.  the scary part was before the lights.  we never heard nor saw anything. it hovered over our heads to get to its take off point and we had no clue.  i know it sounds crazy. at first i thought i dozed off and dreamed it, but after the light and the bang my friend starting freaking the hell out. i knew then what i saw was real. people can deny all they want.  i know now they are out there...It all happened it about 4 seconds. i was too stupified to even try to say "hey look" to my friend. take what you will from this.  there is no exaggeration. it is all 100% truth.
content.summary: Circle of flame then bright light bang breaks the sound barrier and gone

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the passenger seat of my grandmothers car. my grandmother was driving. my aunt and two cousins were in the back seat. we had driven into town to go to walmart. on our way out of town, my cousin yelled "look it's a flying car!" everyone in the car started laughing, we told her "it is probably just an airplane" but when we looked out the window our opinion quickly changed. our jaws dropped. we had no idea what we were witnessing. but it was just hovering over our car. i can't explain how it was hovering to give it justice. i have never seen any plane that moved the way this did. it didn't have wings, had an oval shape, and was much much larger than our small kia car. it moved so fast and then would suddenly stop and hover. the last glimpse i had of it, was hovering over several houses in a neighborhood, shining a bright red light. the lights were large and round attached to the outside of the craft. it did not have windows. we watched it for about 10 minutes before we had driven far enough that we could no longer see it.
content.summary: The strangest, scariest, coolest moment of my entire life.

content.detailedDescription: At first i saw green glowing object falling feom sky, then i witness ordinary glowing star,it was stationary and hovering for few seconds. after for few second observing it, i saw that it was going up vertically, so i thought it as a sky lantern, but when i saw 3 orbs and a red light on right side attachex to it, i became more suspicious, and started noticing it more precisely, and that time we didn't heard any noise, it shape was looking like a boomerang, and we were able to se it's body outline, with light on below, it had wings, with two red orbs attached to each wing ends, and when it reached over our head, at that time only we heard the buzzing noise, it was a jet sound of low frequency, but the speed was very very slow, we were able ro se it's base, it lights and one of the red ord suddenly twisted to left side and detached it self from the main ufo, and went in the north east direction. and the rest of the ufo flew staight to south east direction and after some time we were not able to see it, because of the distance between it and us. it was an mind blowing experience.
content.summary: It changed it shape from the moment we we were looking at it, firstly it appeared like star. then split into orbs, than all orbs converge into bigger orb with a red light following it. it was very fade. at that moment we didn't heard any noise

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way for my classes and there was a huge thunderstorm and suddenly i saw a huge disk like object hovering on the sky i was stunned but i took some pics
content.summary: It was like a disk coming inside of the cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road today when i noticed a black helicopter flying quite low to the ground, i found it odd but continued driving, as soon as the black helicopter passed, i noticed three silver objects in the sky. it amazed me that there were three planes (i assumed) flying that close together. as soon as i told my grandmother to look at the sky, two of the three objects started flying in the same direction of each other, but right before the two objects looked like they were about to crash they turned, it was a really sudden turn and crossed right over the third object. i knew then that it wasn't three planes that i was looking at. my grandmother and i sat there, confused, and wanting answers. it all lasted about three to four minutes. the same two silver objects that were flying around before flew away ridiculously fast and in the same direction while the other one stayed in the same place and never moved.
content.summary: Unexplainable.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road today when i noticed a black helicopter flying quite low to the ground, i found it odd but continued driving, as soon as the black helicopter passed, i noticed three silver objects in the sky. it amazed me that there were three planes (i assumed) flying that close together. as soon as i told my grandmother to look at the sky, two of the three objects started flying in the same direction of each other, but right before the two objects looked like they were about to crash they turned, it was a really sudden turn and crossed right over the third object. i knew then that it wasn't three planes that i was looking at. my grandmother and i sat there, confused, and wanting answers. it all lasted about three to four minutes. the same two silver objects that were flying around before flew away ridiculously fast and in the same direction while the other one stayed in the same place and never moved.
content.summary: Unexplainable.

content.detailedDescription: My brother was driving back home after a fishing trip on hwy 48 when he noticed a bright oval shape object moving slowly from left to right then stopping and hovering. the sky was cloudless at that time of day ,you can see the sunset on the background of the video he recorded. the object had a small object that was trailing the big oval object and was absorbed, but was not captured on the video.
content.summary: Extremely bright oval shape object moving slowly and stopping then going backwards the sky was cloudless

content.detailedDescription: I was at my grandmas and went out for a cigarette and was playing with to see if it was good enough to film the moon.Finished my cigarette and recording and today i dicided to remove old videos i was seeing if the video was any good and i noticed this thing fly across the screen right to left i am not sure if it is smoke from my cigarettebut i do not think so i see smoke at the start and it does not look the same in my opinion i hhave also considered it may be a bird
content.summary: Was outside having a cigarette and took video of moon and have just looked at it

content.detailedDescription:
We visited white sands national park and remained late to observe the sunset and the thousands of visible stars. my wife fell asleep and i was driving on the lonely access road near the park. there was nobody around. while driving i noticed two beige lights hovering in the sky to the south so i pulled over, turned off car and lights, got out and closed my door. it was pitch dark. the two lights in the sky moved very slowly in an easterly direction making no noise for about a minute. i could not tell exactly how far away they were but it was probably at least half a mile. suddenly, one took of to the southwest and upward at a 45% angle at a very high rate of speed. the other light, which was still gliding slowly in an easterly path, made a quick loop motion and give chase to the first light. they climbed out of sight within a few seconds. there were no people around, the sky was totally clear with no clouds, and there are no city lights within 50 miles of that location.

this happened 10 years ago. after stumbling across this website i decided to report it. at first, i thought they might have been experimental military aircraft. but the ability of those objects (at least i had the impression that they were objects) to effortlessly make dramatic directional changes and travel at an astonishing rate of speed while making no sound makes me question that assumption.

i should add that i am 64 years old, work as a conservative insurance manager, do not drink or take drugs, was not on any prescriptions at the time, and have never had any other unidentified aircraft sort of sightings.
content.summary: Two beige lights moving independently moved eastward very slowly. one suddenly changed direction and moved upward at tremendous speed and the other quickly followed.
content.locationName: White Sands National Park, New Mexico

content.detailedDescription:
Using "planes app" on ipad i was observing airbus a-330-300 lx9 swissair (chicago to zurich) directly overhead using fujinon 7x50 binoculars. "app" indicated plane was at 37000 ft. spotted orb while plane was passing directly overhead. orb was to the left of the plane (plane was heading east) and unable to determine if it was above or below the plane. orb remained stationary as plane flew by.
orb was visible without the binoculars and appeared to look like a star to the naked eye. visibility was clear with slight haze. sunset was at 8:49 pm, only 10 minutes prior to sighting. both my girlfriend and myself viewed the orb for approximately 4 minutes through binoculars then it just disappeared as if someone just flipped a switch. no other stars were visible in the sky at the time the orb vanished.
content.summary: Observed ufo while plane watching.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on back porch,you can see them every night.Dont know what it is,it's been happening for years. some sort of a ship with lights going around it. they move slowly until they get to a certain spot where they stop and stay there.Just would like to know what they are. i can sit on my patio and watch them,have a great pair of binoculars when looking thru  them you can see the lights..
content.summary: Lights going around,red,bluish,white there are right of them tonight,they're here every night.

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were outside our carport after going to my cousins wedding.My father was grilling steaks as we did every saturday. when i noticed  a very bright star over a patch of trees. i showed it to my father .That when it begin to start moving towards our direction.My mother came out and noticed we were looking up and it stop directly above us. my mother ran in fear my father ran for a flashlight me i just stood in disbelief i saw a cigar shape with what looked like portholes.And it was huge.  my father shined the flashlight on it remember it is 9:30 at night. the object flash some light when my father shined and flipped the light on and off on his flashlight.My mother came out with a camera but for some reason it would not work. we watch for what seem like hours and slowly it started moving and all the sudden it shot straight up and was gone . we looked at each other in amazement .My father then said to me and mom we will never mention this to anyone or even talk about it to each other. this was june 16 1975 and he died in november of that year.He also said people would call us crazy and silent i remained for many many years. i was 11 years old when it happen now i am 52 years old and that night has haunted me all these years.Just for the record my mother and i sit down before she past away and  wrote down what happen an then gave them to each other. our description of what happen was almost identical. but now is the time to report it because we should that night. i know some will say it was a plane. but what i saw was not man made.
content.summary: Saw a ufo with my parents

content.detailedDescription: I am re-sending photos i found that the first two pics actually have the object on it i did not realize it so im sending them all.
content.summary: Flew from right to left then descended

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a job and as i looked up saw a cylinder like object moving across the sky moving west to east trying not to rear end anyone i  tried to focus to see if i had wings but saw nothing that's when i realized it was of the unknown and rushed for my phone and took 3 pics but was only able to catch it on the third try (lucky) since i was driving in slow traffic that was making it difficult focus in and take a clear pic. if i'm able to send this to a iphone it will play a 3 sec video i'm not sure if it will on your download.
content.summary: Traveled across foxon rd then descended i was able to take a pic on my iphone which it took a 3 sec video

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine bradenton florida recorded footage of what she believes to be a ufo in the cloud structure above a local walmart.

she had her son with her and also claims that there was one other witness to seeing this event take place.

my friend has given me permission to submit this footage for review.

i have looked over the footage several times and i myself find myself stumped on what this could possibly be.
content.summary: Footage taken by friend in bradenton florida over a walmart

content.detailedDescription: I have never seen type of craft like this before. it was round, brown, no lights or windows. there was a small puff of smoke it emitted as it went by. i did turn to watch it go on by towards end of airplane. i couldn't ask my daughter to look. (talking with another person.)  i waited a few weeks before saying anything to her. she said was the craft on the same level that the plane was. i said "yes". and no one else said anything about it. so i dropped it, but wonder what it was. a while later on the flight i saw another airplane flying somewhat lower but that was odd to me.I didn't think planes flew that close to each other. anyway, the craft i saw was not that big, but no windows at all, and all brown.
content.summary: In an airplane going from florida to dallas. looking out window i saw a small round craft going by towards end of airplane. no noise, no windows, just a small puff of "smoke"

content.detailedDescription: On aug 2 @ 11pm myself (brandon fisher and 7kids were about 100ft from our apartment when we saw a huge glowing light coming at us from ne then it broke apart and became 2 a smaller one and larger one that both start blinking red yellow and green over and over while hovering over either homes or trees in that area.As we entered our home the bigger one disappeared..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufos over east austin

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were sitting on my backyard deck, when i noticed a funny shaped object coming from the northeast. the sky had light clouds scattered about. this was approximately at 1230pm, on august 2, 2016. 
i was just looking up watching the clouds when i noticed it. we thought it was a commercial jet at first, but quickly realized it had two cylinder shaped objects that were attached to each other across the sides. no wings, just winglets on the cylinders. 
it was traveling from the northeast to the southwest. it actually got pretty close to us overhead. we had a very good view from below. could clearly see the two cylinders that were attached in the middle. it was traveling at about the same speed that a commercial jet travels across the sky. 
it was amazing to see something so different from a jet or an airplane. fascinating. just kept watching it till it disappeared into a cloud, and then it was out of sight.
content.summary: Observed the object going overhead and watched it till it disappeared into a cloud. 2of us saw it. had 2cylinder shapes attached to each other.

content.detailedDescription: I see these daily now and have other footage
content.summary: 2 ufos crossing each other's path

content.detailedDescription:
Two ufos similar in nature were moving erratically, stopping on occasion, fading in and fading out, changed directions suddenly, and would go further away and return closer, rise and fall in altitude slowly and quickly...Almost as if they were monitoring the mountain range. once the disappeared (about 1.45 hrs)i went back inside and have bee watch for them about every hour.

nor is this my first sighting in the rockies, or elsewhere in the world. i lost 2 hours coming home last friday night from the ufo watchtower conference about 2 hours after i had sighted a bright ufo similar to the ones i saw today, in what would have been approximately the same area these two were in. i left the watchtower at 2:15 am saturday morning,29 august 2016, and arrived home (52 miles) at 5:25 am saturday morning. i looked at my clock, as it was dark on the south side of poncha pass headed north, and when was coming down into poncha springs, i looked at my clock again, as i noticed there was a lot of daylight on the north side of the pass.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two bright spheres over monarch pass coloardo

content.detailedDescription: My wife took two pictures of a glowing orb that moved toward her. in one photo, you can see the orb casts a shadow. it appears to be approximately 2 feet above the ground, and moved toward her.
content.summary: Glowing/hovering orb

content.detailedDescription:
left mother-in-law's house (festusmo) with my wife driving a convertible car i'm in the front passenger seat car top down (no alcohol no drugs in system).  traveling on highway m  about 8 miles south of byrnes mill missouri and  before hwy 21, i noticed long white streaky clouds  approximately three or 4 miles away best guess, then out of nowhere vapor streaks of appeared with no visible object in front of them (3 or so  timed out every couple of seconds ---)
i thought how unusual the vapor streaks were very bright  and straight heading east.
the vapor streaks maybe several hundred feet long stopped when they got to the narrow cloudbank i had been watching.  my emotions were that was interesting why could i not see a lead craft i see them all the time living in ballwin missouri on top of a hill and a frequent jet route both military and  commercial. 
 this really got my attention, and my wife noticed that something was up, she also saw the streaks but only after i pointed them out to her. i continued to watch this long drawnout cloud bank, when suddenly a darker metallic round (maybe cylinder)  object appeared out of the clouds where the streaks went into them on the opposite side .  this was more of a long drawnout cloud not very wide maybe quarter-mile half-mile wide.  the object  was traveling south by southwest ( away from the car ) and a moving along the edge of the cloud i watched it until i could not see it anymore. this was an interesting experience i honestly do not know what i saw experimental aircraft, extraterrestrial, don't know.  one final observation was that when the craft was flying along the clouds it's speed compared to the speed of the streaks was maybe one fourth in other words it was moving much slower than whatever caused the streaks,  that to me was not normal aircraft.

i'm not sure if this is the form for reporting my life ufo incidences, but here it goes condensed old to new.
1) my friend michael liautaud (owner milios subs) 1970s upstate wisconsin while in car  bright light comes towards car and the car electronics is fried,  parents confirmed story.
2)1978 returning from chicago to cary illinois i  noticed several lights near barrington road and algonquin rd,  upon finally getting to that intersection i noticed very large metallic object moving slowly and making a sound.  this observation ended with me staring up at it outside of the car as it moved away from me . (the ironic part of the story is that mike leotaud  was the driver of the car).  according to my high school science teacher there hadn't been strange sightings in this area before.
3) 1993 my mother had just passed away in her home at  venice florida.  that night i engaged in conversation with a retired air force colonel.  getting into a spiritual conversation while holding his latter during a lightbulb replacement in front of his house,  he told me a story that he claims he had only told a few people.  mid-1960s during practice touchdown and takeoffs and fighter jets they were scrambled to a identified flying object his partner in the lead 
jet  said that the object was doing circles around him  before it left out of sight.
in  the early a.M. after he had gone to bed his door suddenly opens and sure enough men in suits debrief  after he had gone to bed his door suddenly opens and sure enough men in suits debrief him him and tell my moms neighbor that this never happened you will never talk about it or you will lose your career.
4) in  approximately 2001 laying down face up on a pair in madeira beach florida i watched a circular object that actually appeared to be pinkish on color  and about cloud high  just go right by in a straight line faster than any military jet i have ever seen fly above me.
5) while visiting a  friend of my wife's that lives a  little east of desoto missouri. his property is on much acreage and on top of a hill.  he opened up to me out of the clear blue that he had never been ufo kind of guy but and approximately april or may 2014 he had seen three or four  white orb type of light moving at incredible speeds north east of desoto.  i could tell from his story he was quite shaken up.
the end
 except for the last incident i'm reporting today. 
(also it appears that there has been many sightings in missouri in what i now call the triangle
an area  going from byrnes mill to arnold to desoto missouri.)
content.summary: Intermittent streaks traveling east into long thin cloud  no object seen.  two minutes later metallic object appears along cloud having sw

content.detailedDescription: Ufos about 60 of them...Just hanging out
content.summary: Ufos about 60 of them...Just hanging out

content.detailedDescription: I had bought a i/r camera and went outside that night to try it out . when i downloaded it to my computer and didn't see anything that got my attention .     so 2 or 3 months later when i went back over my night vision films and found a couple of very interesting objects.
content.summary: Filmed 2 or 3 aliens on ufo

content.detailedDescription:
It lasted  for three nights friday night  saturday night sunday night may 27th-29th 2016  about four hours each night from dust to midnight   before you  asighn a  investigator you should call me first and make sure that i have someway to confirm who you are and your title in mufon 
it is to much to  wright about what you need to do is send one of your best investigators to interview me it would take too long for me  to give you the whole story in this email as you can tell by the questions i answered it is more than you can ever expect to receive  i will attach 5  screen captures to give you an idea of what i'm talking about some of pics you may need to enlarge to see all that is in the pics  some of the pics i have a very obvious but in most there is two objects in the pic.
i'll be waiting for a call from  some one in management at mufon please do not take this report likely it is very very important.  to give you an idea of my background  i am retired from the us military  also worked 25 years for 2 food equipment and chemical  marketing co and also worked as a please officer in this state for the last 10 years.
  just to give you an idea that i do have the background to take me  seriously. 
thank you i'll be waiting for someone to call me
content.summary: Call b4 someone else does may 27-28-29  orbs ufo  audio pics recording  video  the first person that meets with me will get everything so far i've only received two callbacks with zero follow up  but it may take time for them to get back to me u b first

content.detailedDescription: Sat in my garden about midday get, heard chinnock helicopter overhead so decided to try and get a photo of it on my phone, as i zoomed in i could see 4 unknown objects in front of it travelling in the same direction and moving at the same speed as the helicopter, before i could take a second photo the objects had disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Photo taken of chinnock helicopter with 4 objects in front of it, then the objects disappeared into cloud

content.detailedDescription: Lettting dogs out looked up and saw bluish white light in sky grabbed phone and took video of it.Thought it was a plane at first but heard no sound of engines from a plane. object movewd at a rapid speed from east to south eas ta and then vanished.Could not belive what i had seen thought it waws strange how a light can move that fast then vanish
content.summary: Light seen in sky heading from east to south east

content.detailedDescription:
As i was told by the witness she was sitting outside on her deck at approximately 5:30 am having a coffee. her older daughter came out onto the deck to sit with her mother and have a coffee. as the daughter came out from the house with her coffee, she noticed a bright object in the sky. she told her mother and pit down her coffee and managed to take two pictures of the object. 
her daughter noticed the object when she came out from the house because it was very bright and was flying across the path of the moon. she was not sure of what it was right away but soon came to the conclusion that is was an ufo and quickly reacher for her camera phone.
as i was told the object flew in a straight line with no sound and continued in a south west direction until it was no longer observed. the mother and her daughter very excited when they first realized what they were seeing. the daughters reaction was to get a picture as quickly as possible to show her friends that she had seen a ufo . shortly after observing the object and taken two pictures of it the mother and daughter talked about what they just seen and discussed if they should put the picture on facebook and shortly decided to do so.
the object disappeared as it became to difficult to see anymore as it flew further away from their location.
content.summary: It just flew across the path of the moon, shone brightly and soon out of sight.
